data.question: What is the primary method used to confirm the solid to solid mechanism in the transformation of PPF-18 and PPF-20 to their daughter structures?
data.answer: Single-crystal to single-crystal experiments following the method reported by Suh.

data.question: What technique was employed to overcome deviations in intensity due to significant preferred orientation in X-ray powder diffraction spectra?
data.answer: Crystals were mounted in a sealed capillary tube, and X-ray powder diffraction was performed while the tube was spinning to remove the preferential orientation.

data.question: How was the concentration of DPNI in the solution estimated during the transformation process from PPF-20 to PPF-4?
data.answer: UV/Vis spectra were taken at different times during the reaction, and absorbance spectra obtained from standard solutions of DPNI were used to make calibration curves at 360 and 380 nm.

data.question: What was the purpose of the acid digestion study performed on the daughter structures of PPF-18 and PPF-20?
data.answer: To observe if there was any residual DPNI linker left inside of the pores of the daughter structures.

data.question: True or False: The overall crystal shape is retained during the transformation from parent to daughter structures in the single-crystal to single-crystal transformation experiments.

What was the main absorption peak observed in the UV/Vis absorption spectra of digested PPF-27 synthesized from PPF-18?
data.answer: The main absorption was centered at 430 nm, which corresponds to the Soret band of ZnTCPP.

data.question: True or False: The Connolly surface models were calculated for all structures to show the possibility of pillars diffusing through the pores of the PPF structures.
What was the reaction kinetics study used to observe during the transformation of PPF-20 to PPF-4?
data.answer: The study was used to observe the reaction proceed by taking multiple UV/Vis spectra at different times during the reaction, showing DPNI molecules coming out from the framework into solution.

data.question: True or False: The experimental patterns obtained using the spinning capillary method matched well with the theoretical powder diffraction pattern for PPF-18, PPF-20, PPF-27, and PPF-4.
What was the purpose of using the spinning capillary method in the X-ray powder diffraction experiments?
data.answer: The spinning capillary method was used to remove the preferential orientation and obtain experimental patterns that match well with the theoretical powder diffraction pattern.

data.question: True or False: The UV/Vis absorption spectra of digested samples of the daughter structures showed visible absorption at either 360 or 380 nm, implying the presence of DPNI linker.
What was the estimated transformation percentage of the framework during the transformation from PPF-20 to PPF-4 based on the UV absorption data?
data.answer: At 120 minutes, the transformation was estimated to be 97% complete.

data.question: True or False: The Connolly surface models indicated that the pores were large enough to facilitate diffusion in and out of pillar molecules for all structures.
What was the main absorption peak observed in the UV/Vis absorption spectra of ZnTCPP standard solution?
data.answer: The main absorption centered at 427 nm corresponds to the Soret band of ZnTCPP.
